Articles.Content:
Some new crafts from builder startreader to satisfy your hunger.

Our first meal/craft is the ADC-001C (Jet Plane Mk2)!

This jet is an extension of the 1B. It seats two kerbals and is great for beginner flying, since it includes a "safety" abort system and is single-engine, which means no deadly flat-spins.

Next on the menu/catalog is the Dunation Box Rover V3!

This large, part-heavy kerbal transporter, used for transporting kerbals around bases and exploring higher-gravity bodies. It has an attachment under the COM, making rocket placement that* much easier.

Finally, we have the Kerbal Emergency Recovery System!

This fairly simple vehicle was made after numerous incidents of kerbals being stranded around the kerbin SOI. It is designed to rescue kerbals scattered around in orbit around kerbin, the mun, and minmus. Interplanetary flights have not been tested, fly at your own risk. Well actually, you are always flying at your own risk. Who am I kidding, its KSP.

Downloads for all: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/f0crkon9k966ggi/u4h_JEx0mE
Pictures may not be working, if not click on the download which should also take you to the pics.

Please a mod move this to Rocket Builders! Also, I'm not somewhere I can download it, and no pics(like you just said)

EDIT: Yeah, I found the pictures. Looks cool.

Edited October 7, 2013 by Darndello
Wow, I'm a noob. *Pics found
